content.question: A. Using the images shown, describe TWO differences between the cultural landscapes of these pilgrimage locations. B. Explain how the spread of Islam from its culture hearth is an example of relocation diffusion. C. Explain how the global spatial pattern of Hinduism differs from the global spatial pattern of universalizing religions such as Buddhism. D. Explain a likely cultural effect of the patterns of migration associated with the location shown in Image 2. E. Explain the degree to which religion may act as a centrifugal force within the location shown in Image 1.
